headline: BNY Mellon price target raised to $96 from $87 at Keefe Bruyette
summary: Keefe Bruyette raised the firm’s price target on BNY Mellon (BK) to $96 from $87 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. The U.S. bank stocks have had a strong run following better than expected earnings and, more importantly, the election results, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm believes there are “potential tangible outcomes” post-election to drive higher earnings, including investment banking, trading, market sensitive revenues such as custody and asset manageme
